questions.question: What is the term for a group of individuals of the same species living in the same area?
Which level of ecological organization involves both biotic and abiotic components?
What term is used for animals that eat plants?
What is the term for a symbiotic relationship where both species benefit?
In the food chain, which organism is always at the start?
What is the term for the variety of life in the world or in a particular habitat or ecosystem?
What term describes the maximum population size that an environment can sustain indefinitely?
What is the term for a large naturally occurring community of flora and fauna occupying a major habitat?
What is the main difference between a food chain and a food web?
options: A food chain shows a single pathway, while a food web shows multiple pathways
A food web shows a single pathway, while a food chain shows multiple pathways
A food chain is a type of food web
A food web is a type of food chain
questions.correct_answer: A food chain shows a single pathway, while a food web shows multiple pathways

questions.question: Which type of organism breaks down dead organic material?
